gpt-4-turbo.name: GPT-4 Turbo
gpt-4-turbo.description: Most capable GPT-4 model with 128K context
gpt-4-turbo.useCase: Complex reasoning, long documents, high-quality outputs

gpt-3.5-turbo.name: GPT-3.5 Turbo
gpt-3.5-turbo.description: Fast and cost-effective for simple tasks

claude-3-opus-20240229.name: Claude 3 Opus
claude-3-opus-20240229.description: Most capable Claude model with 200K context

sap-ai-core-gpt-4.name: GPT-4 (via SAP AI Core)
sap-ai-core-gpt-4.description: GPT-4 accessed through SAP AI Core (base pricing)
sap-ai-core-gpt-4.disclaimer: SAP AI Core returns token counts only. Pricing estimated using base GPT-4 rates. Actual costs may include SAP markup.

sap-ai-core-gpt-35-turbo.name: GPT-3.5 Turbo (via SAP AI Core)
sap-ai-core-gpt-35-turbo.description: GPT-3.5 Turbo via SAP AI Core (base pricing)
sap-ai-core-gpt-35-turbo.disclaimer: SAP AI Core returns token counts only. Pricing estimated using base GPT-3.5 rates. Actual costs may include SAP markup.

sap-ai-core-claude-3-sonnet.name: Claude 3 Sonnet (via SAP AI Core)
sap-ai-core-claude-3-sonnet.description: Claude 3 Sonnet via SAP AI Core (base pricing)
sap-ai-core-claude-3-sonnet.disclaimer: SAP AI Core returns token counts only. Pricing estimated using base Claude rates. Actual costs may include SAP markup.

notes.tokenEstimation: Rough estimate: 1 token ≈ 4 characters or 0.75 words
notes.sapAICore: SAP AI Core only returns token counts, not costs. Pricing here is based on underlying model rates and may not include SAP markup. Use for estimation only.
notes.contextWindow: Maximum tokens (input + output) the model can process
notes.pricing: Prices are per 1,000 tokens. Actual costs calculated as: (tokens / 1000) × price
notes.source: Pricing based on LiteLLM database (Apache 2.0). Prices accurate as of January 2026.
notes.updates: Check provider websites for latest pricing: OpenAI (https://openai.com/pricing), Anthropic (https://www.anthropic.com/pricing)
